verses.text: And \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, \w Build|strong="H1129"\w* me here \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* me here \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w oxen|strong="H6499"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*.

And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*; and \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* and \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* on \add every\add* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* and a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*.

And \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, \w Stand|strong="H3320"\w* by thy burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and I will \w go|strong="H3212"\w*: peradventure the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w come|strong="H7136"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* me: and \w whatsoever|strong="H1697"\w* he \w sheweth|strong="H7200"\w* me I will \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee. And he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to an high \w place|strong="H8205"\w*.\f + \fr 23.3 \ft to an…: or, solitary\f*

And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w met|strong="H7136"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, I have \w prepared|strong="H6186"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, and I have \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* upon \add every\add* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* and a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* a \w word|strong="H1697"\w* in \w Balaam’s|strong="H1109"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Return|strong="H7725"\w* unto \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, and thus thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

And he \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto him, and, lo, he \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* by his burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w*, he, and all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

And he took \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w parable|strong="H4912"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H5148"\w* me from \w Aram|strong="H0758"\w*, out of the \w mountains|strong="H2042"\w* of the \w east|strong="H6924"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* me \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and \w come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w defy|strong="H2194"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* shall I \w curse|strong="H5344"\w*, whom \w God|strong="H0410"\w* hath not \w cursed|strong="H6895"\w*? or how shall I \w defy|strong="H2194"\w*, \add whom\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not \w defied|strong="H2194"\w*?

For from the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w rocks|strong="H6697"\w* I \w see|strong="H7200"\w* him, and from the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* I \w behold|strong="H7789"\w* him: lo, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w alone|strong="H0910"\w*, and shall not be \w reckoned|strong="H2803"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

Who can \w count|strong="H4487"\w* the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w fourth|strong="H7255"\w* \add part\add* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? Let me \w die|strong="H4191"\w* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w*, and let my \w last|strong="H0319"\w* end be like his!\f + \fr 23.10 \ft me: Heb. my soul, or, my life\f*

And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, What hast thou \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto me? I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* thee to \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and, behold, thou hast \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add them\add* \w altogether|strong="H1288"\w*.

And he \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Must I not take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* that which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w put|strong="H7760"\w* in my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*?

And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, I pray thee, with me unto \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, from whence thou mayest \w see|strong="H7200"\w* them: thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w but|strong="H0657"\w* the \w utmost|strong="H7097"\w* part of them, and shalt not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* them all: and \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* me them from thence.

¶ And he \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* him into the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Zophim|strong="H6839"\w*, to the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Pisgah|strong="H6449"\w*, and \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* and a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* on \add every\add* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.\f + \fr 23.14 \ft Pisgah: or, the hill\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, \w Stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w here|strong="H3541"\w* by thy burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, while I \w meet|strong="H7136"\w* \add the \+nd Lord\+nd*\add* \w yonder|strong="H3541"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w met|strong="H7136"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* a \w word|strong="H1697"\w* in his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, and \w say|strong="H1696"\w* thus.

And when he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to him, behold, he \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* by his burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* with him. And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, What hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*?

And he took \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w parable|strong="H4912"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; \w hearken|strong="H0238"\w* unto me, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zippor|strong="H6834"\w*:

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* \add is\add* not a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, that he should \w lie|strong="H3576"\w*; neither the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, that he should \w repent|strong="H5162"\w*: hath he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, and shall he not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*? or hath he \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, and shall he not make it \w good|strong="H6965"\w*?
Behold, I have \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \add commandment\add* to \w bless|strong="H1288"\w*: and he hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*; and I cannot \w reverse|strong="H7725"\w* it.

He hath not \w beheld|strong="H5027"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* in \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, neither hath he \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w perverseness|strong="H5999"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* with him, and the \w shout|strong="H8643"\w* of a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \add is\add* among them.
\w God|strong="H0410"\w* brought them \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; he hath as it were the \w strength|strong="H8443"\w* of an \w unicorn|strong="H7214"\w*.

Surely \add there is\add* no \w enchantment|strong="H5173"\w* against \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, neither \add is there\add* any \w divination|strong="H7081"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: according to this \w time|strong="H6256"\w* it shall be \w said|strong="H0559"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* and of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, What hath \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w wrought|strong="H6466"\w*!\f + \fr 23.23 \ft against: or, in\f*

Behold, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* as a great \w lion|strong="H3833"\w*, and lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* himself as a young \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*: he shall not lie \w down|strong="H7901"\w* until he \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add of\add* the \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*.

¶ And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, Neither \w curse|strong="H5344"\w* them at \w all|strong="H6895"\w*, nor \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* them at \w all|strong="H1288"\w*.

But \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, \w Told|strong="H1696"\w* not I thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, All that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w*, that I must \w do|strong="H6213"\w*?

¶ And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, I pray thee, I will \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* thee unto \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*; peradventure it will \w please|strong="H3474"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* that thou mayest \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* me them from thence.

And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* unto the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Peor|strong="H6465"\w*, that \w looketh|strong="H8259"\w* \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jeshimon|strong="H3452"\w*.

And \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, \w Build|strong="H1129"\w* me here \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* me here \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*.

And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* had \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* and a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* on \add every\add* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.
